articles.description: Latest transfer news, plus countdown to England's Women's World Cup semi-final and reaction from Manchester United's win over Wolves.
articles.title: Transfers latest, Lionesses & reaction to Man Utd win

articles.description: Spain beat Sweden to reach their first Women's World Cup final in a dramatic finish in Auckland.
articles.title: Spain beat Sweden in dramatic finish to reach final

articles.description: Wolves boss Gary O'Neil says elite referees manager Jon Moss told him he "could not believe" his side were not given a late penalty in the 1-0 defeat at Manchester United.
articles.title: Referees chief couldn't believe penalty not given - O'Neil

articles.description: With England set to name their provisional World Cup squad soon, BBC Sport and CricViz assess their options and look at how winning teams are usually built - and you can pick your own.
articles.title: Stokes? Archer? Roy? Build England's World Cup squad

articles.description: Watch highlights as Spain beat Sweden thanks to a late Olga Carmona goal in a dramatic finish to the match to reach their first ever Women's World Cup final.
articles.title: Spain beat Sweden to reach first Women's World Cup final

articles.description: England star Georgia Stanway says the off-field support she has received from former Manchester United midfielder Luke Chadwick has played a key role in her rise.
articles.title: 'He cares for everyone' - Stanway hails 'mentor' Chadwick

articles.description: American veteran Venus Williams beats a top-20 player for the first time since 2019 with victory over Veronika Kudermetova in the Cincinnati Open first round.
articles.title: Venus Williams, 43, earns biggest win in four years

articles.description: West Ham's move for Manchester United's Harry Maguire stalls due to uncertainty over whether the defender is prepared to join the club.
articles.title: West Ham want alternative after Maguire deal stalls

articles.description: Former Baltimore Ravens and Seattle Seahawks running back Alex Collins dies at the age of 28.
articles.title: Former NFL running back Collins dies aged 28

articles.description: England manager Sarina Wiegman says "Australia are not just Sam Kerr" so they need to be wary of other threats in their Women's World Cup semi-final.
articles.title: Australia 'not just Sam Kerr', says Wiegman
